text: hi I'm Jen Hartford with Amazon web
services reinvent team I'm excited to
talk with you about how we've expanded
our 2016 AWS reinvent
campus new this year we have added three
locations to accommodate all of our
sessions and boot camps at the Mirage
you will find resource mini conferences
and Industry pre dayss at The Encore we
have dedicated this space for our
popular boot camps that will run all
week Monday through Wednesday if you
went to last year's AWS reinvent you
will remember the link property where we
hosted the replay party this year we've
actually turned that space into the park
at reinvent which will hold Kino
overflow viewing areas and will be a
great place for meetings and mingling
with your fellow attendees at the
venation and Palazo as in years past we
will hold the live Keynotes hundreds of
sessions certification exams Hands-On
Labs the expo hall Global partner Summit
hackathons and game day
we have also added live viewing
experiences throughout the Venetian
Mirage Encore and link to watch the
Keynotes and featured sessions we have
created clear and easy walking paths
with signage AWS reinvent ambassadors
will also be available to guide you
throughout our expanded
campus from the Venetian to the Mirage
is a 20-minute walk from the Venetian to
Encore is a 15-minute walk from the link
to the Venetian is a 20-minute walk from
the Venetian to the park it's an easy
walk these walk times take into account
walking through casinos Street Crossings
and stop lights the walking paths are
clear and easy for you to get around no
cars necessary if you do have mobility
issues or need assistance transportation
is available just email us at AWS
reinvent duport amazon.com and let us
know your needs we are excited about our
expanded campus at AWS reinvent 2016 and
look forward to seeing you in Las Vegas
November 28th through December 2nd
